# Retrospective Action Item Template

Use this template to convert retrospective findings into trackable backlog issues.

## Action Item

**Title:** [Clear, actionable title]

**Priority:** [P0 - Critical / P1 - High / P2 - Medium / P3 - Low]

**Category:** [Process / Tooling / Communication / Technical / Documentation]

### Description
[Detailed description of what needs to be done and why]

**Context from Retrospective:**
- [Key observation or pain point identified]
- [Impact on team or project]

### Owner
**Assigned to:** [Name / Role]  
**Backup/Support:** [Name / Role]

### Due Date
**Target completion:** [YYYY-MM-DD]  
**Review milestone:** [Sprint/Release]

### Success Criteria
- [ ] [Measurable criterion 1]
- [ ] [Measurable criterion 2]
- [ ] [Measurable criterion 3]

### Implementation Notes
[Steps to complete or considerations]

1. [Step 1]
2. [Step 2]
3. [Step 3]

### Dependencies
- [Dependency 1 - if any]
- [Dependency 2 - if any]

### Tracking
- **Created:** [YYYY-MM-DD]
- **Status:** [Not Started / In Progress / Blocked / Completed]
- **Last Updated:** [YYYY-MM-DD]
- **Retrospective Reference:** [Link to retro notes/issue]

### Follow-up
- Review progress in weekly PM sync
- Update status in project board
- Report completion in next retrospective

---

## Example Action Item

**Title:** Improve PR review turnaround time

**Priority:** P1 - High

**Category:** Process

### Description
Reduce average PR review time from 2 days to 24 hours to improve development velocity and reduce context switching.

**Context from Retrospective:**
- Multiple developers mentioned PRs sitting for 2-3 days without review
- Slows down feature delivery and creates bottlenecks
- Causes developers to context switch frequently

### Owner
**Assigned to:** Alex Chen (Dev Lead)  
**Backup/Support:** Jamie Park (PM)

### Due Date
**Target completion:** 2025-12-01  
**Review milestone:** Sprint 24

### Success Criteria
- [ ] Average PR review time reduced to <24 hours (measured over 2 weeks)
- [ ] No PR waits >2 business days without review or comment
- [ ] Team reports improved velocity in next retrospective

### Implementation Notes
1. Establish PR review rotation schedule
2. Set up Slack alerts for PRs pending >24 hours
3. Add "needs review" label and dashboard
4. Discuss in next team meeting

### Dependencies
- None

### Tracking
- **Created:** 2025-11-14
- **Status:** Not Started
- **Last Updated:** 2025-11-14
- **Retrospective Reference:** Sprint 23 Retrospective (#42)

### Follow-up
- Review progress in weekly PM sync
- Update status in project board
- Report completion in next retrospective
